H0.text: The 1965 film ‘The Heroes of Telemark’ is set in which European country. Norway

H1.text: The 1965 film ‘The Heroes of Telemark’ is set in which European country. Sweden

H2.text: The 1965 film ‘The Heroes of Telemark’ is set in which European country. Denmark

H3.text: The 1965 film ‘The Heroes of Telemark’ is set in which European country. Noreg

A4.text: It was filmed on location in Norway.

A5.text: The Norwegian resistance sabotage the Vemork Norsk Hydro plant in the town of Rjukan in the county of Telemark, Norway
